front.title: Route Distinguisher Outbound Route Filter for BGP-4

abstract.t: This draft defines a new Outbound Route Filter (ORF) type, called the Route Distinguisher ORF (RD-ORF). RD-ORF is applicable in BGP/MPLS IP Virtual Private Networks and Ethernet VPN, in which the Route Reflector (RR) and Autonomous System border router (ASBR) do not maintain the VPN routes.
